text: TicketCity | Sys Admin | Austin, TX | Onsite https://www.ticketcity.com/ We are an eCommerce marketplace for live events (sports, concerts, theater). If you are customer service focused and love working on a close-knit team, we want you! https://jobs.lever.co/ticketcity/8db5220b-dbb7-4c1b-b93a-160... Feel free to email me (Caitlin) at csullivan@ticketcity.com to learn more about the role or life at as a TicketCitizen!
